Footer.tagline: Free online tools for developers, students, and professionals worldwide.

HomePage.heroSubtitle: A collection of useful, privacy-friendly tools. No sign-up required. Works in your browser, instantly.
HomePage.privacyFirstDesc: All calculations run in your browser. No data is ever sent to our servers.
HomePage.instantResultsDesc: No loading spinners. Results appear as you type with zero server roundtrips.
HomePage.worksEverywhereDesc: Mobile-friendly, no installation required. Just open and use.

metadata.title: ToolsShed - Free Online Tools
metadata.description: Free online tools for developers, students, and professionals. JSON Formatter, Base64, UUID Generator, Unit Converters, and more.

developer.name: Developer Tools
developer.description: Essential tools for developers: JSON, Base64, UUID, hashing, and more.

converters.name: Unit Converters
converters.description: Convert between units of length, weight, temperature, and more.

text.name: Text Tools
text.description: Tools for text manipulation, counting, and conversion.

finance.name: Finance Tools
finance.description: Calculators for interest, percentages, loans, and investments.

health.name: Health Tools
health.description: Health calculators for BMI, calories, and fitness metrics.

time.name: Time Tools
time.description: Time zone converters, age calculators, and date utilities.

json-formatter.name: JSON Formatter & Validator
json-formatter.description: Format, validate, and beautify JSON data.
json-formatter.metaDescription: Format, validate, and beautify JSON data with syntax checking. Free online JSON formatter ‚Äî works in your browser with no server uploads.

uuid-generator.name: UUID Generator
uuid-generator.description: Generate random UUIDs (v4) for use in your applications.
uuid-generator.metaDescription: Generate random UUIDs (v4) instantly in your browser. Free, no sign-up required.

base64.name: Base64 Encoder / Decoder
base64.description: Encode text or files to Base64 and decode Base64 strings.
base64.metaDescription: Encode text or files to Base64 and decode Base64 strings. Free online Base64 tool.

url-encoder.name: URL Encoder / Decoder
url-encoder.description: Encode and decode URLs and query parameters.
url-encoder.metaDescription: Encode and decode URLs and query parameters. Free online URL encoding tool.

hash-generator.name: Hash Generator
hash-generator.description: Generate MD5, SHA-256, and SHA-512 cryptographic hashes.
hash-generator.metaDescription: Generate MD5, SHA-256, and SHA-512 hashes client-side. No data leaves your browser.

jwt-decoder.name: JWT Decoder
jwt-decoder.description: Decode and inspect JSON Web Token payloads without signature verification.
jwt-decoder.metaDescription: Decode and inspect JWT headers and payloads. Free, browser-based JWT inspector.

length-converter.name: Length Converter
length-converter.description: Convert between meters, feet, inches, miles, kilometers, and more.
length-converter.metaDescription: Convert between meters, feet, inches, miles, and kilometers. Free online length converter.

weight-converter.name: Weight Converter
weight-converter.description: Convert between kilograms, pounds, ounces, grams, and more.
weight-converter.metaDescription: Convert between kilograms, pounds, ounces, and grams. Free online weight converter.

temperature-converter.name: Temperature Converter
temperature-converter.description: Convert between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin.
temperature-converter.metaDescription: Convert between Celsius, Fahrenheit, and Kelvin. Free online temperature converter.

word-counter.name: Word & Character Counter
word-counter.description: Count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs in your text.
word-counter.metaDescription: Count words, characters, sentences, and paragraphs. Free online word counter.

case-converter.name: Case Converter
case-converter.description: Convert text to UPPERCASE, lowercase, Title Case, camelCase, and more.
case-converter.metaDescription: Convert text between UPPERCASE, lowercase, Title Case, camelCase, snake_case, and more.

password-generator.name: Password Generator
password-generator.description: Generate strong, secure passwords with customizable options.
password-generator.metaDescription: Generate strong, secure passwords with customizable length and character types.

compound-interest.name: Compound Interest Calculator
compound-interest.description: Calculate compound interest growth for investments over time.
compound-interest.metaDescription: Calculate compound interest growth for investments. Free online compound interest calculator.

percentage-calculator.name: Percentage Calculator
percentage-calculator.description: Calculate percentages, percentage change, and tip amounts.
percentage-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate percentages, percentage change, and tip amounts. Free online percentage calculator.

bmi-calculator.name: BMI Calculator
bmi-calculator.description: Calculate Body Mass Index with metric and imperial units.
bmi-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate your Body Mass Index (BMI) with metric or imperial units. Free online BMI calculator.

age-calculator.name: Age Calculator
age-calculator.description: Calculate exact age in years, months, and days from a birth date.
age-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate your exact age in years, months, and days from a birth date. Free online age calculator.

timezone-converter.name: Timezone Converter
timezone-converter.description: Convert time between different time zones around the world.
timezone-converter.metaDescription: Convert time between different time zones around the world. Free online timezone converter.

color-converter.name: Color Converter
color-converter.description: Convert colors between HEX, RGB, and HSL formats instantly.
color-converter.metaDescription: Convert colors between HEX, RGB, and HSL formats instantly. Free online color converter ‚Äî works in your browser.

number-base-converter.name: Number Base Converter
number-base-converter.description: Convert numbers between binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal.
number-base-converter.metaDescription: Convert numbers between binary (base 2), octal (base 8), decimal (base 10), and hexadecimal (base 16). Free online number base converter.

regex-tester.name: RegEx Tester
regex-tester.description: Test and debug regular expressions with live match highlighting.
regex-tester.metaDescription: Test and debug regular expressions with live match highlighting. Free online regex tester ‚Äî no sign-up required.

markdown-preview.name: Markdown Preview
markdown-preview.description: Write Markdown and preview the rendered output in real time.
markdown-preview.metaDescription: Write Markdown and instantly preview the rendered output. Free online Markdown editor and live previewer.

unix-timestamp.name: Unix Timestamp Converter
unix-timestamp.description: Convert between Unix timestamps and human-readable dates.
unix-timestamp.metaDescription: Convert Unix timestamps to human-readable dates and vice versa. Free online Unix timestamp converter.

csv-json.name: CSV ‚Üî JSON Converter
csv-json.description: Convert CSV data to JSON and JSON arrays back to CSV format.
csv-json.metaDescription: Convert CSV to JSON and JSON to CSV instantly in your browser. Free online CSV JSON converter ‚Äî no upload required.

diff-checker.name: Diff Checker
diff-checker.description: Compare two texts and highlight the differences line by line.
diff-checker.metaDescription: Compare two texts and highlight additions, removals, and changes. Free online diff checker ‚Äî works entirely in your browser.

lorem-ipsum.name: Lorem Ipsum Generator
lorem-ipsum.description: Generate placeholder Lorem Ipsum text for design and development.
lorem-ipsum.metaDescription: Generate Lorem Ipsum placeholder text by paragraphs, sentences, or words. Free online Lorem Ipsum generator.

html-encoder.name: HTML Encoder / Decoder
html-encoder.description: Encode special characters to HTML entities and decode them back.
html-encoder.metaDescription: Encode special characters to HTML entities and decode HTML entities back to text. Free online HTML encoder decoder.

yaml-json.name: YAML ‚Üî JSON Converter
yaml-json.description: Convert between YAML and JSON formats instantly.
yaml-json.metaDescription: Convert YAML to JSON and JSON to YAML instantly in your browser. Free online YAML JSON converter.

data-storage-converter.name: Data Storage Converter
data-storage-converter.description: Convert between bytes, kilobytes, megabytes, gigabytes, terabytes, and more.
data-storage-converter.metaDescription: Convert between bytes, KB, MB, GB, TB and binary units (KiB, MiB, GiB). Free online data storage converter.

speed-converter.name: Speed Converter
speed-converter.description: Convert between km/h, mph, m/s, knots, and other speed units.
speed-converter.metaDescription: Convert between km/h, mph, m/s, knots, and feet per second. Free online speed converter.

area-converter.name: Area Converter
area-converter.description: Convert between square meters, square feet, acres, hectares, and more.
area-converter.metaDescription: Convert between square meters, square feet, acres, hectares, and more. Free online area converter.

volume-converter.name: Volume Converter
volume-converter.description: Convert between liters, gallons, fluid ounces, cubic meters, and more.
volume-converter.metaDescription: Convert between liters, gallons, fluid ounces, cups, and cubic meters. Free online volume converter.

slug-generator.name: Slug Generator
slug-generator.description: Convert any text into a clean, URL-friendly slug.
slug-generator.metaDescription: Convert any text into a clean URL-friendly slug. Free online slug generator for SEO-friendly permalinks.

text-repeater.name: Text Repeater
text-repeater.description: Repeat any text or character a specified number of times.
text-repeater.metaDescription: Repeat any text, word, or character any number of times with a custom separator. Free online text repeater.

discount-calculator.name: Discount Calculator
discount-calculator.description: Calculate sale prices, discount amounts, and savings instantly.
discount-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate sale price and savings from any discount percentage. Free online discount and sale price calculator.

loan-calculator.name: Loan Calculator
loan-calculator.description: Calculate monthly payments, total interest, and amortization for loans.
loan-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate monthly loan payments, total interest, and full amortization schedule. Free online loan and mortgage calculator.

roi-calculator.name: ROI Calculator
roi-calculator.description: Calculate return on investment and annualized ROI for any investment.
roi-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate return on investment (ROI) and annualized ROI for any investment. Free online ROI calculator.

tdee-calculator.name: TDEE Calculator
tdee-calculator.description: Calculate your Total Daily Energy Expenditure and daily calorie needs.
tdee-calculator.metaDescription: Calculate your Total Daily Energy Expenditure (TDEE) and daily calorie needs based on activity level. Free online TDEE calculator.

ideal-weight.name: Ideal Weight Calculator
ideal-weight.description: Calculate your ideal body weight based on height using multiple formulas.
ideal-weight.metaDescription: Calculate your ideal body weight using Robinson, Miller, Devine, and Hamwi formulas. Free online ideal weight calculator.

body-fat.name: Body Fat Calculator
body-fat.description: Estimate body fat percentage using the U.S. Navy method.
body-fat.metaDescription: Estimate your body fat percentage using the U.S. Navy method. Free online body fat calculator for men and women.

date-difference.name: Date Difference Calculator
date-difference.description: Calculate the exact number of days, weeks, and months between two dates.
date-difference.metaDescription: Calculate the exact number of days, weeks, and months between any two dates. Free online date difference calculator.

time-duration.name: Time Duration Calculator
time-duration.description: Add or subtract hours, minutes, and seconds to calculate time durations.
time-duration.metaDescription: Add or subtract time durations in hours, minutes, and seconds. Free online time duration calculator.

UuidGenerator.infoText: UUIDs are generated using crypto.randomUUID() (v4) ‚Äî cryptographically random, generated entirely in your browser.

Base64Tool.infoText: Supports Unicode text. Encoding/decoding happens entirely in your browser ‚Äî no data is sent to any server.

HashGenerator.disclaimer: MD5 is computed client-side. SHA-256 and SHA-512 use the browser's native crypto.subtle API. No data leaves your browser.

JwtDecoder.notVerifiedNote: This tool only decodes the JWT ‚Äî it does NOT verify the signature. Never share sensitive tokens.

WordCounter.inputPlaceholder: Start typing or paste your text here...

CaseConverter.inputPlaceholder: Type or paste text to convert...

CsvJson.invalidJson: Input must be a JSON array of objects

DiffChecker.noChanges: No differences found ‚Äî texts are identical.

SlugGenerator.inputPlaceholder: Enter text to convert to slug...

BodyFat.methodNote: Calculated using the U.S. Navy method

AboutPage.title: About ToolsShed
AboutPage.subtitle: Free, fast, and privacy-friendly tools ‚Äî no sign-up, no data collection.
AboutPage.whatIsText: ToolsShed is a growing collection of free online tools for developers, students, and professionals. Whether you need to format JSON, convert units, generate a password, or calculate compound interest ‚Äî it's all here, free, and instant.
AboutPage.privacyFirstDesc: Every tool runs entirely in your browser. Nothing you type is ever sent to a server.
AboutPage.noFrictionDesc: No sign-up, no account, no paywall. Open the tool and use it instantly.
AboutPage.builtForEveryoneDesc: Country-neutral tools that work the same whether you're in New York, London, or Tokyo.
AboutPage.techStackText: ToolsShed is built with modern, open-source technologies:
AboutPage.techNext: Next.js 16 ‚Äî React framework with static site generation
AboutPage.openSourceText: ToolsShed is open source. Found a bug? Want to suggest a tool? Contributions are welcome.

metadata.title: About
metadata.description: Learn about ToolsShed ‚Äî a collection of free, privacy-friendly online tools.

NotFound.title: Tool Not Found
NotFound.description: The tool you're looking for doesn't exist yet ‚Äî but we're always adding more!

PrivacyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPage.overviewText1: ToolsShed ("we", "us", or "our") operates the website tools-shed.com. This page informs you of our policies regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of personal information when you use our service.
PrivacyPage.overviewText2: The short version: All tools on ToolsShed run entirely in your browser. We do not store, transmit, or process any data you enter into our tools on our servers.
PrivacyPage.noCollectText: ToolsShed tools operate entirely client-side. This means:
PrivacyPage.noCollectItem1: Text you paste into JSON Formatter, Base64, or any other tool
PrivacyPage.noCollectItem2: Passwords generated by the Password Generator
PrivacyPage.noCollectItem3: Health data entered into the BMI Calculator
PrivacyPage.noCollectItem5: Any other input you provide to our tools
PrivacyPage.noCollectFooter: None of this data ever leaves your device or is sent to any server.
PrivacyPage.analyticsText1: We use Google Analytics 4 to understand how visitors interact with our site (e.g., which tools are most popular, how long visitors stay, which countries visitors come from). This data is anonymous and aggregated.
PrivacyPage.analyticsOptOut: Google Analytics uses cookies. You can opt out by installing the
PrivacyPage.adsenseText1: We use Google AdSense to display advertisements. Google AdSense uses cookies to serve ads based on your prior visits to our website or other websites on the internet.
PrivacyPage.adsenseText2: Google's use of advertising cookies enables it and its partners to serve ads based on your visit to our site and/or other sites on the internet. You may opt out of personalized advertising by visiting
PrivacyPage.commentsText1: Our comment system is powered by Giscus, which stores comments as GitHub Discussions. If you choose to leave a comment, you must sign in with a GitHub account. Your comment and GitHub profile information will be publicly visible on GitHub.
PrivacyPage.cookiesText: We use the following types of cookies:
PrivacyPage.thirdPartyText: Our website may contain links to external sites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content of those sites. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any external sites you visit.
PrivacyPage.childrenText: ToolsShed is not directed to children under the age of 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.
PrivacyPage.changesText: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last updated" date. Continued use of the site after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
PrivacyPage.contactText1: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please open an issue on our

metadata.title: Privacy Policy
metadata.description: Privacy Policy for ToolsShed ‚Äî how we handle your data.
